title: Institutions of Higher Education in Germany
text: data sourced following tables lists: key tables student statistics (table series 372) provided Federal Statistical Agency (Destatis) data collection portal (Erhebungsportal). four key tables / csv files containing data institutions higher education Germany: 1.) Hochschule, 2.) HochschulStandort, 3.) HochschuleErsteinschreibung, 4.) HochschulFachbereich, slight differences institutions counted (e.g. university subsidiary campuses cities German states, classification university hospitals), list institutions higher education Germany provided German Rector’s Conference (HRK). Federal Statistical Agency data together HRK list “authoritative German numbers” exist. German English Wikipedia article institution, Wikidata entry institution, Logos sourced data URIs Wikimedia Commons (preferred), German English Wikipedia entry. available, SVGs preferred raster formats. described vignette("ror"), use global Research Organization Registry (ROR) REST API retrieve additional data identifiers matched existing data.

title: Institutions of Higher Education in Germany
text: available, following identifiers institution included: 9-digit Participant Identification Code (PIC) used EU Funding & Tenders Portal (Wikidata Property P5785), identifier GEPRIS database funded research projects, published German Research Foundation (DFG) (Wikidata Property P4870), German Research Institution (GERiT) ID institution (see https://gerit.org/en/), ID used German Rector’s Conference (HRK), ETER (European Tertiary Education Register) ID Research Infrastructure Research Innovation Studies (RSIS) see https://register.orgreg.joanneum./#//1). Note free account required use services. Research Organization Registry (ROR) ID (see vignette("ror") Wikidata Property P6782), ID World Higher Education Database (WHED) International Association Universities.

what: A rant about the Higher Education Compass / Hochschulkompass and data licences
title: Institutions of Higher Education in Germany
text: One obvious addition ?hochschulen dataset link Higher Education Compass / Hochschulkompass HRK. Unfortunately, compass website uses lot obfuscating Javascript make direct links difficult. Now, HRK semi-public institution funded Stiftung zur Förderung der Hochschulrektorenkonferenz. foundation mainly raises funds grants Länder Federal Ministry Education Research. Moreover, mostly public members (around 271 institutions higher education) HRK pay annual membership fees. According website, “information found Higher Education Compass authorized universities updated employees universities ”. backdrop, incomprehensible HRK deems worthwhile protect Higher Education Compass data. Use data public /private competitors provide better offerings additional data different UI encouraged, made difficult! , non-confidential data public institutions largely paid taxpayers’ money, administered staff mostly public sector… ?hochschulen dataset consciously consists almost exclusively identifiers links, avoid data licencing issues. Particularly private providers, like ZEIT studieren.de, naturally vested business interest protect data discourage direct links best can.

title: Research Organization Registry (ROR)
text: Research Organization Registry (ROR) global, community-led registry open persistent identifiers research organizations. Research Organization Registry (ROR) includes IDs metadata 107,000 organizations counting. Registry data CC0 openly available via search interface, REST API, data dump. Registry updates curated community process released least month.

title: Research Organization Registry (ROR)
text: Version 2 ROR schema API released April 15, 2024 (official API documentation). Let us use REST API retrieve data German research organizations education. determine many pages need retrieve order obtain entire result set, check metadata.number_of_results divide 20. Regardless page , metadata.number_of_results indicates total number results returned request. total number search results query filtering types:education country.country_code:DE gives 544 results. means request data 28 pages. can implement httr2::iterate_with_offset.
code: ror_base_url <- "https://api.ror.org/v2/organizations"  req <- httr2::request(   ror_base_url ) |>    httr2::req_url_query(     filter = c(       "types:education",       "country.country_code:DE"     ),     .multi = "comma"   )  resp <- req |>    httr2::req_perform()  resp_body <- resp |>    httr2::resp_body_json()  no_of_results <- resp_body$number_of_results no_of_pages <- ceiling(no_of_results / 20) ror_base_url <- "https://api.ror.org/v2/organizations"  req <- httr2::request(   ror_base_url ) |>    httr2::req_url_query(     filter = c(       "types:education",       "country.country_code:DE"     ),     .multi = "comma"   ) |>    httr2::req_throttle(     10   )  resps <- httr2::req_perform_iterative(   req,   next_req = httr2::iterate_with_offset(     param_name = "page",     resp_pages = function(resp) ceiling(httr2::resp_body_json(resp)$number_of_results / 20)   ),   max_reqs = Inf ) #> Iterating ■■■■■■                            18% | ETA:  5s #> Iterating ■■■■■■■■■                         25% | ETA:  4s #> Iterating ■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■         79% | ETA:  1s #> Iterating ■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■  100% | ETA:  0s  df_ror_germany_education <- resps |>    purrr::map(     httr2::resp_body_json   ) |>    purrr::map(     "items"   ) |>    purrr::list_flatten() |>    tibble::tibble() |>    tidyr::unnest_wider(     1   )  df_ror_germany_education #> # A tibble: 544 × 11 #>    admin        domains established external_ids id      links  locations names  #>    <list>       <list>        <int> <list>       <chr>   <list> <list>    <list> #>  1 <named list> <NULL>         2003 <list [3]>   https:… <list> <list>    <list> #>  2 <named list> <NULL>         1946 <list [2]>   https:… <list> <list>    <list> #>  3 <named list> <NULL>         1992 <list [2]>   https:… <list> <list>    <list> #>  4 <named list> <NULL>         1991 <list [3]>   https:… <list> <list>    <list> #>  5 <named list> <NULL>         1964 <list [2]>   https:… <list> <list>    <list> #>  6 <named list> <NULL>         1700 <list [3]>   https:… <list> <list>    <list> #>  7 <named list> <NULL>         1991 <list [3]>   https:… <list> <list>    <list> #>  8 <named list> <NULL>         1978 <list [3]>   https:… <list> <list>    <list> #>  9 <named list> <NULL>           NA <list [2]>   https:… <list> <list>    <list> #> 10 <named list> <NULL>         1992 <list [2]>   https:… <list> <list>    <list> #> # title: Student Statistics from the Landesdatenbank NRW (Table Series 21311)
text: downloaded raw data included package, size roughly 200 MB. licence requires list changes part source notes (see ). data transformation steps performed: Technical columns ending “QUAL”, “ERR”, “LOCK” removed. original data uses variable value labels separate lookup tables. R package, labels added using labelled::set_variable_labels labelled::set_value_labels, respectively.

what: License for the data from the Landesdatenbank NRW / Destatis
title: Student Statistics from the Landesdatenbank NRW (Table Series 21311)
text: data package obtained Landesdatenbank NRW using code “21311” “Statistik der Studenten”. licence data obtained Landesdatenbank NRW / Destatis available (see paragraph 2 section 2): Data licence Germany – attribution – Version 2.0. Paragraph 2 section 3 requires including reference dataset (URI) available. best knowledge, Landesdatenbank NRW yet provide Uniform Resource Identifiers (URI) identify tables. Paragraph 3 stipulates “changes, editing, new designs amendments must marked source note”. Compared raw data, following changes made: (1) technical columns ending “QUAL”, “ERR”, “LOCK” removed, (2) variable value labels added table using labelled package. code transformations available package.
